name: far from home (goblincat)
description:
🛸 spacecat is far from home - what did they find? 🛸

This is basically a tiny dressup game! that's it

Notes on uploading your own bg image: Give the game a second to load the image. If your image is too big/not square, it'll crop it to the left. If you'd like to play around with a randomly generated image (highly recommended), use this image url.

Notes on mobile: This game technically works on mobile (or at least on my phone) but for intended experience, please play on desktop.

Code credit here:

  • Allow copy paste in WebGL (thank you so much kou-yeung for saving me...thank you)
  • Dynamically change collider size
  • Click and drag sprite

Examples

All bg photos from picsum!
